wikipedia_page.main: Anthony McShane (28 February 1927 – 24 December 2012) was a Northern Irish footballer and manager who played in the Football League for Plymouth Argyle and Swindon Town. After his playing career, McShane had spells as manager of Scunthorpe United and Chesterfield.

response: He signed with Tony McShane's Chesterfield for the 1964–65 season. He scored 10 goals in 21 games at Saltergate before his death in a car accident on 17 December 1964.
